calculations.name: Col DV01 T
calculations.tableau_expression:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] then [Col DV01] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then [Col DV01] else 0 END END

calculation_context.Expression:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] then [Col DV01] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then [Col DV01] else 0 END END

calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
